name: La Villa Marbella - Charming Hotel

reviews.title: If you want character and service - Stay Here - It's Perfect
reviews.text: After seeing all of the complimentary reviews here, we just had to try La Villa Marbella ourselves.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was, quite simply, a wonderful location (in the old city), with superb accomodation (including a roof terrace to sit out and enjoy a bottle of wine!), and the perfect host (Marcos).
reviews.title: Fantastic

likes.disliked: — Ask the staff for recommendations on places to visit/eat in

reviews.text: This is "boutique hotel" at its very best - of course you don't get the "big hotel" facilities - but quite honestly, I dont want (or indeed use) them anyway.
reviews.title: I couldn't believe it!

reviews.text: I'd rather have the personal touch that Marcos clearly takes both great pride and pleasure in providing to all of his customers - and he is so knowledgeable.....for example drawing us a detailed map of where to park in Ronda - spot on and we'd never have found it without his help!
reviews.title: Great Owner

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We will be going back, and if you want somewhere "different" then stay here.....you won't be disappointed!!
reviews.title: perfect place to stay

reviews.text: We loved everything about this hotel. The property consists of different buildings - former houses in the old town which are close to each other. The main building includes reception, terrace for breakfast/drinks and some guest rooms. We stayed in the Banyan Room which was the top floor in another house and included a balcony. We traveled with our infant and the space was perfect for our family - it felt more like a flat than a hotel room. The location is great - the old town is picturesque and quiet and it is very easy to walk to restaurants, beach, etc. The staff was fabulous - very helpful and full of great suggestions for day trips, restaurants, parking spots, etc. Marcos usually joined us for breakfast and helped us plan our day's itinerary. Everything about this hotel has been well thought out and it shows.
reviews.title: Can't Get Much Better Than This
Fabulous Hotel - Dublin Family
reviews.text: Myself and my family stayed at La Villa Marbella on a short break at the end of January for my Dad's 70th brthday. We can all honestly say it was one of the most fabulous and memorable breaks we have ever had.

reviews.title: Charming Romantic Hotel
reviews.text: The owner Marcus and his team, Violly and Amy could not not have done enough for us between recommending amazing restaurants to suprising my Dad with champagne in his room.

reviews.title: Exceeded all expections!
reviews.text: We will definately be back!!

reviews.title: absolutely a gem
reviews.text: We stayed at La Villa Marbella on a short break at the end of January. The hotel was all we expected and more! It is situated in an excellent location in the fabulous old town of Marbella. I can honestly say it is one of the most romantic hotels I have stayed in as it is so quaint. The owner, Marcos and his team were so welcoming and friendly. Nothing was too much trouble and each of them were more than happy to offer their expertise advice on the area, when it came to restaurant reservations etc. I definitely hope to return there later in the year. My only worry is that they won't have availability because of the excellent reviews - all well deserved!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I loved everything about La Villa Marbella, but there were a few prime factors that made me decide that it should deserve the full 5 stars. The location of the hotel in the moorish picturesque Old Town was simply charming with its little narrow cobbled streets, squares and corners that had such distinct character. I loved walking by the warm sunny coastline everyday which was just a stone throw away from the hotel. The Old Town certainly did not lack in food department. As a seafood and tapas lover, I sampled some of the best seafood restaurants as directed by the hotel crew, and from experience, the small little busy all-spanish restaurants were the best places to go for authentic foods! The exceptional service by the hotel crew gave my partner and I such a memorable time during our holiday. Attention was paid to every single detail to its very best; the rooms were immaculate, breakfast served every morning was served with such hospitality, the hotel crew made sure all our needs were met, and everyday they tirelessly gave us detailed directions to places of interests, and restaurants we had to try. Marcos and his team goes all out to ensure that you have an enjoyable and unforgettable holiday.
reviews.title: Exceeded all expectations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In a nutshell, the immaculate service, perfect location and wonderful hotel will blow you away! We certainly hope to return soon.
reviews.title: The most fantastic hotel stay ever!
Great small hotel
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at La Villa Marbella for 5 nights in December, 2006. There are not enough words that can possibly describe the incredible stay at this beautiful hotel.

reviews.title: The best Boutique Hotel...
reviews.text: When booking our trip, I was sure that all the reviews I read could not possibly have all been accurate - but I was so happy to be proven wrong! The reviews were all accurate - and then some!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Marcos, Bolivar, Ana, and everyone at La Villa Marbella made our stay with them the most perfect vacation we could ever want- we are already planning our next trip back!
reviews.title: A great little hotel!
Totally Sublime
reviews.text: When travelling to Marbella, Spain we recommend a stay at the Villa Marbella - luxury Bed & Breakfeast.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived as weary visitors from the U.S. , travelling by plane, bus and taxi to this charming old - walled town. Our host, Marcos and his staff, welcomed us with their hospitality. We felt like we had our own personal guide, concierge, and friend in Marbella. Marcos's experience in the industry is evidenced by his daily attentiveness to details of his guests' whims. He took the time at breakfeast on the rooftop each morning to listen to our adventures, plan excursions, arrange money exchanges ( best rates ) and call ahead for dinner reservations. Each restaurant surpassed our expectations.
reviews.title: Perfection in great little location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Music selected by our host was playing softly in the CD player when we arrived to our room. The mood was set for a relaxing and romantic vacation. The room had every amenity, safe box, mini-stocked refrigerator, TV that onewould expect from luxury accomodations. Each room is beautifully decorated with Bali teak and Spanish / Asian decor. The bathroom is modern ! Take a book and enjoy the view of the rooftop!
reviews.title: Takes some Beating

likes.disliked: — That we only stayed one night

reviews.title: Quaint Hotel
reviews.text: Following Marcos's recommendations we enjoyed beach days and explored winding streets of Old Marbella and nearby towns. The days and nights were fun-filled ones punctuated by siestas. We easily fell into Spanish routines - forget the time ! We felt like ambassadors because we met mostly Europeans who were surprised that we travelled so far. Apparently they had been vacationing in Marbella for years and staying for at least a month.

reviews.title: A little hideaway we should all try to keep for ourselves
reviews.text: If you learn some Spanish phrases you will find your excursions more enjoyable. I can still recall the fragrances as we strolled through Orange Square at nite. Thank you Marcos and Staff for all your hard work and dedication each day at Villa Marbella. We arrived as first time visitors and left feeling as though we had just visited a long time friend. We will be back !

description: La Villa Marbella Charming Hotel is located inside the romantic Old Town of the internationally renowned Marbella. The 150 years old house has been fully refurbished and the 4 suites carry a very cozy Asian Style. The rooms are full equipped: air conditioner, heater, ceiling fan, TV satellite, stereo chain, ads, mini bar, safety box, electronic keys, telephone with private voice mail and full amenities in the bathroom. From the terrace, during the breakfast or relaxing in our Chinese Lounge, you will enjoy stunning views of the Sierra Blanca, Old Town and the Castle Walls. 3 minutes walk to the famous Orange Square and its selected bars and restaurants, 7 minutes walk to the beach or 10 minutes by car to the famous Marina Puerto Banus and its nightlife , La Villa Marbella gives you the tranquility of the Old Town yet close to the interesting points of the city. You will come back !!
